markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anchor of Aquatic Exploration](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2186)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 114 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 690 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

No matter how often it's washed, the last crystals of salt rime never quite leave this pitted anchor. When you're holding the _anchor of aquatic exploration_, you can breathe underwater; however, you can't [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39), losing any Swim speed you have, automatically failing any [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to Swim, and so on. Instead, when you enter a body of water, you sink to the bottom at a rate of 25 feet per round and can move across the bottom at your normal Speed. You're protected from environmental effects of deep water such as pressure, cold temperatures, and any negative consequences of depressurization.

<document level="2" id="action-1683" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Anchor of Aquatic Exploration
